definition: to fasten tightly with a hoop
tight/strict/close at hand/near/urgent/tense/hard up/short of money/to tighten

sentences.english: 3 the attachment frame should be set up in the tower body standard section connection place, the hoop tight tower body.
sentences.chinese: 附着框架宜設置在塔身標準節連接處，箍緊塔身。
